column1: '''''Bonhams Books, Maps, Manuscripts and Historical Photographs 12 June 2012''''' is an auction catalogue from Bonhams (London). The description for Lot 150 includes extracts of a postcard from [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] to Miss Kilbride (cf. "[[Letter to Miss Kilbride]]"). The postcard is reproduced in a photograph.<ref>{{webcite
column4: articlename=Tolkien Handwritten Postcard For Auction - Bonhams 12 June 2012
